name: iot-mqtt-parser
description: Reusable MQTT parser middleware for IoT telemetry with comprehensive logging, statistics, and InfluxDB integration

scripts.help:
echo '
ðŸ¤– IoT Parser Commands:
  npm start              - Start the parser
  npm run dev            - Start with auto-restart
  npm test               - Run validation tests
  npm run test:influx    - Test InfluxDB connection
  npm run stats          - Statistics CLI help
  npm run simulate       - Standard simulation
  npm run simulate:burst - Quick burst test
  npm run help           - Show this help
'

author: Your Friend Grok
